name: Veet Hair Removal Cream,Dry Skin
description: Experience silky smooth skin and delightful scent with the New Veet Hair Removal Cream, now with Silk & Fresh Technology. Veet works close to the root of the hair, giving you superior, long-lasting smoothness. The dry skin formula is developed with Shea Butter, famous for its moisturizing properties, and it is scented with Lily fragrance. So you’ll be left with not just smooth, but silky-soft, nourished & moisturized skin.* Images for illustration purpose only. Product recieved may vary.
